name: Python
description: The primary programming language used for the backend logic, including Django framework and data processing scripts.

name: Django
description: High-level Python web framework used for the entire site structure, ORM, request handling, and admin interface.

name: HTML5
description: Standard markup language for creating the web pages and structuring content.

name: Tailwind CSS
description: A utility-first CSS framework for rapidly building custom user interfaces. Used for all styling on this site.

name: JavaScript
description: Used for client-side interactivity, such as the theme toggle and potentially for future dynamic features like form validation or interactive demos.

name: SQLite
description: Default development database. Lightweight, file-based, and easy to set up for local development.

name: PostgreSQL
description: Robust open-source relational database, often preferred for production deployments due to its features and scalability. (Planned for production)

name: Docker
description: Containerization platform to package the application and its dependencies, ensuring consistent environments from development to production.

name: Git
description: Version control system for tracking code changes, branching, merging, and collaboration. Essential for any software project.

name: GitHub
description: Platform for hosting Git repositories, managing the project's codebase, and collaborating on issues and features.

name: Visual Studio Code
description: Primary code editor used for development, offering features like debugging, Git integration, and extensions.

name: Render
description: Platform-as-a-Service (PaaS) used for deploying and hosting the live version of this portfolio website.

name: Whitenoise
description: Python library used for serving static files (CSS, JavaScript, images) efficiently in production with Django, especially on PaaS.

name: Google Fonts
description: Service used for importing the 'Inter' font family, which is used for typography across the site.

name: Heroicons
description: A set of free, MIT-licensed SVG icons. Used for some of the icons throughout the site (often via Tailwind UI examples or directly).

name: Prism.js
description: A lightweight, extensible syntax highlighter, used for displaying code snippets attractively on project or blog pages.

name: CSV Data Import Scripts
description: Custom Django management commands were written to populate initial database content from CSV files for projects, skills, topics, etc.

name: Django Data Migrations
description: Django's migration system used for schema changes and one-off data setup tasks like creating the initial superuser.

name: 100 Days of Code: The Complete Python Pro Bootcamp (Udemy)
description: A comprehensive Python course by Dr. Angela Yu that solidified foundational and advanced Python skills, including web development with Flask.

name: Codecademy Data Science & Web Dev Paths
description: Various career paths completed on Codecademy, covering Data Analytics, Machine Learning, NLP, Data Engineering, and Full-Stack Web Development.

name: Django Documentation
description: The official Django documentation is an invaluable and frequently consulted resource for all aspects of Django development.

name: Tailwind CSS Documentation
description: Official Tailwind CSS documentation used extensively for understanding and applying utility classes for styling.

name: MDN Web Docs
description: Mozilla Developer Network provides comprehensive documentation for web technologies like HTML, CSS, and JavaScript.

name: Stack Overflow
description: A go-to community for asking and finding answers to programming questions across all technologies used.
